body.p: To the Hon B Magoffin Governor of Kentucky

your petitioners would respectfully state that John Montgomery was fined $20 for Gaming at the March term 1861 of the Carroll Circuit Court We respectfully state that the game was for amusement stakes 5 cts -- that said Montgomery is not a gambler.
We therefore request your excellency to remit said fine.

John Montgomery
W M Fisher
M. T. Pryor
T W Minish
H C Thielkeld
F. M Mothershead
John J. Orr
W. T. Manning
William Donaldson
H, T M Cluke
P. U. Major Comth. Atty

Carroll Cir. Ct
$20. } Gaming
Jno Montgomery
